languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, спешу доложить о тревожных известиях, что принесли мне духи корабля. Дело крайне деликатное и касается леди Кассии. Видите ли, ее присутствие с первого дня вносит смуту в привычный уклад жизни команды. Если позволите, я подготовила рапорт со всеми подробностями".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, спешу доложить о тревожных известиях, что принесли мне духи корабля. Дело крайне деликатное и касается леди Кассии. Видите ли, ее присутствие с первого дня вносит смуту в привычный уклад жизни команды. Если позволите, я подготовила рапорт со всеми подробностями".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, спешу доложить о тревожных известиях, что принесли мне духи корабля. Дело крайне деликатное и касается леди Кассии. Видите ли, ее присутствие с первого дня вносит смуту в привычный уклад жизни команды. Если позволите, я подготовила рапорт со всеми подробностями".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since the first day her presence disturbes the usual way of life of the crew. If you'll allow, I've prepared a detailed report."

You see, since the first day her presence disturbes the usual way of life of the crew. If you'll allow, I've prepared a detailed report."

You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."

"Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."

"Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我匆忙向您报告，是因为船上的机魂给我带来了令人不安的消息。这件事情极其微妙，而且关系到卡西娅女士。如您所知，自从她第一天上船起，船员们的生活就受到了干扰。如果您允许的话，我已经准备好了一份详细的报告。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我匆忙向您报告，是因为船上的机魂给我带来了令人不安的消息。这件事情极其微妙，而且关系到卡西娅女士。如您所知，自从她第一天上船起，船员们的生活就受到了干扰。如果您允许的话，我已经准备好了一份详细的报告。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, me apresuro a transmitirle las inquietantes noticias que me proporcionan los espíritus máquina de la nave. Se trata de un asunto extremadamente delicado que concierne a lady Cassia. Verá: desde su primer día a bordo, su presencia ha perturbado la vida diaria de la tripulación. Si me lo permite, he preparado un informe detallado».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, me apresuro a transmitirle las inquietantes noticias que me proporcionan los espíritus máquina de la nave. Se trata de un asunto extremadamente delicado que concierne a lady Cassia. Verá: desde su primer día a bordo, su presencia ha perturbado la vida diaria de la tripulación. Si me lo permite, he preparado un informe detallado».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich muss Euch eiligst über die beunruhigenden Neuigkeiten informieren, die mir die Maschinengeister des Schiffs zugetragen haben. Die Angelegenheit ist extrem heikel und betrifft Lady Cassia. Ihre Anwesenheit auf dem Schiff hat die Lebensweise der Crew von Anfang an beeinträchtigt. Wenn Ihr gestattet ... ich habe einen detaillierten Bericht vorbereitet."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich muss Euch eiligst über die beunruhigenden Neuigkeiten informieren, die mir die Maschinengeister des Schiffs zugetragen haben. Die Angelegenheit ist extrem heikel und betrifft Lady Cassia. Ihre Anwesenheit auf dem Schiff hat die Lebensweise der Crew von Anfang an beeinträchtigt. Wenn Ihr gestattet ... ich habe einen detaillierten Bericht vorbereitet."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai à vous communiquer des informations préoccupantes qui m'ont été transmises par les esprits de la machine du vaisseau. Il s'agit d'une affaire très délicate concernant dame Cassia. Depuis son premier jour à bord, sa présence a un effet délétère sur le mode de vie de l'équipage. Sauf votre respect, j'ai préparé un rapport détaillé que j'aimerais vous soumettre. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai à vous communiquer des informations préoccupantes qui m'ont été transmises par les esprits de la machine du vaisseau. Il s'agit d'une affaire très délicate concernant dame Cassia. Depuis son premier jour à bord, sa présence a un effet délétère sur le mode de vie de l'équipage. Sauf votre respect, j'ai préparé un rapport détaillé que j'aimerais vous soumettre. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船の機械精霊から届いた不穏なニュースを急いでご報告します。この問題は、とてもデリケートで、カシア様に関わるものです。ご存知のとおり、乗船初日から彼女がいることで、クルーの生活スタイルを乱していました。よろしければ、詳しい報告内容をご用意しています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船の機械精霊から届いた不穏なニュースを急いでご報告します。この問題は、とてもデリケートで、カシア様に関わるものです。ご存知のとおり、乗船初日から彼女がいることで、クルーの生活スタイルを乱していました。よろしければ、詳しい報告内容をご用意しています」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, geminin makine ruhlarından aldığım fena haberleri acilen size iletmem gerek. Mesele son derece hassas ve Leydi Cassia'yla ilgili. Kendisi, gemiye ayak bastığı ilk günden beri mürettebatı günlük yaşantılarında rahatsız ediyor. Müsaadeniz olursa teferruatlı bir rapor hazırladım."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I hasten to report the disturbing news brought to me by the machine spirits of the ship. The matter is extremely delicate and concerns Lady Cassia. You see, since her first day aboard, her presence has been a disturbance to the crew's way of life. If you'll allow, I have prepared a detailed report."
